title: Does YG Entertainment spoil Black Pink members? - Quora

response.answer_text: We really dont know what is happening inside the Korean Entertainment Industry but in this question, ill answer it through my speculations, and its a no, i believe yg does things for their artists and for themselves (thats why mistreatments happen) [i saw an answer which says jennie is spoiled no u babo(if ure looking on to it bcos of the outfits go do ur research, and if its the lines, girl jennie is mistreated to shes a rapper but receives vocal lines)]

yes, they do spoil blackpink members cause they like jennie more than the others which spoils jennie by thinking she is greater than the other members and even lisa she literally overacts and i don’t think jisoo and rose and spoiled
